p.d: 29 January 1817. A young Englishman bought the Ch√¢teau de Seraing, former residence of the prince-bishops of Liege, to build steam engines. Thus began a fabulous industrial adventure that successfully survived all the crises and wars that followed. Even today John Cockerill's visionary spirit is alive and well at Seraing. Directed by: Bernard Balteau (Belgium, 2016)
